verses.verse: Then <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H4179>Moriah,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> the Lord <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H25>father,<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H3559>prepared<s%> in the threshing <S%H1637>floor<s%> of <S%H771>Ornan<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusite.<s%>
And he <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> in the <S%H8145>second<s%> day of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H702>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4438>reign.<s%>

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the things wherein <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> was <S%H3245>instructed<s%> for the <S%H1129>building<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%> The <S%H753>length<s%> by <S%H520>cubits<s%> after the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4060>measure<s%> was three <S%H8346>score<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And the <S%H197>porch<s%> that was in the <S%H6440>front<s%> of the house, the <S%H753>length<s%> of it was <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H1363>height<s%> was an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty:<s%> and he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it <S%H6441>within<s%> with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And the <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> he <S%H2645>paneled<s%> with <S%H1265>fir<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> which he <S%H2645>overlaid<s%> with <S%H2896>fine<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H5927>set<s%> <S%H5921>thereon<s%> <S%H8561>palm<s%> trees and <S%H8333>chains.<s%>
And he <S%H6823>garnished<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> for <S%H8597>beauty:<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold<s%> was <S%H2091>gold<s%> of <S%H6516>Parvaim.<s%>

He <S%H2645>overlaid<s%> also the <S%H1004>house,<s%> the <S%H6982>beams,<s%> the <S%H5592>posts,<s%> and the <S%H7023>walls<s%> thereof, and the <S%H1817>doors<s%> thereof, with <S%H2091>gold;<s%> and <S%H6605>graved<s%> <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7023>walls.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> whereof was <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits:<s%> and he <S%H2645>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2896>fine<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> amounting to <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3603>talents.<s%>

And the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of the <S%H4548>nails<s%> was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%> And he <S%H2645>overlaid<s%> the <S%H5944>upper<s%> <S%H5944>chambers<s%> with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And in the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> of <S%H6816>image<s%> <S%H4639>work,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3671>wing<s%> of the one cherub was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> <S%H5060>reaching<s%> to the <S%H7023>wall<s%> of the <S%H1004>house:<s%> and the <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H3671>wing<s%> was likewise <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> <S%H5060>reaching<s%> to the <S%H3671>wing<s%> of the <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H3742>cherub.<s%>

And one <S%H3671>wing<s%> of the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> <S%H5060>reaching<s%> to the <S%H7023>wall<s%> of the <S%H1004>house:<s%> and the <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H3671>wing<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> also, <S%H1692>joining<s%> to the <S%H3671>wing<s%> of the <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H3742>cherub.<s%>

The <S%H3671>wings<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H6566>spread<s%> themselves forth <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits:<s%> and they <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> their <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and their <S%H6440>faces<s%> were <S%H1004>inward.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H3758>crimson,<s%> and fine <S%H948>linen,<s%> and <S%H5927>worked<s%> <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H5921>thereon.<s%>

Also he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>high,<s%> and the <S%H6858>capital<s%> that was <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of each of them was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8333>chains,<s%> as in the <S%H1687>oracle,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars;<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7416>pomegranates,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them on the <S%H8333>chains.<s%>

And he <S%H6965>reared<s%> up the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1964>temple,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> on the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> on the <S%H8040>left;<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that on the <S%H3227>right<s%> <S%H3227>hand<s%> <S%H3199>Jachin,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that on the <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H1162>Boaz.<s%>
